metadata.Title: CVE-2017-15094 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description: An issue has been found in the DNSSEC parsing code of PowerDNS Recursor from 4.0.0 up to and including 4.0.6 leading to a memory leak when parsing specially crafted DNSSEC ECDSA keys. These keys are only parsed when validation is enabled by setting dnssec to a value other than off or process-no-validate (default).

criterions.comment: pdns-recursor package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
